description: Educational language games for children and students

games.title: Trivia Crack
games.description: Trivia Crack is a fun quiz game where you can test your general knowledge and learn amazing facts about the world. Know more by playing the worldwide #1 hit trivia game. Itâ€™s showtime!

games.title: Google Feud
games.description: Google Feud is a casual game where you must guess part of a Google query. There are 10 answers for each question, presented in a quiz format similar to Family Feud. Like the hit quiz show, you have 3 guesses, so use them wisely!
